Welcome to the Smith Surveying Equipment Limited Online Store

Smith Surveying Equipment Limited supply, hire, service & calibrate surveying & safety equipment to the survey, construction & engineering industries.

Serving the Humberside region from our base in Hull, East Yorkshire, we sell, hire, repair, service & calibrate land survey and construction laser equipment, including Total Stations, Theodolites, GPS Surveying Equipment, Levels, Laser Levels, Pipe Lasers, Dual Grade Lasers, Surveying Accessories and Cable & Pipe Detectors.

With equipment manufactured by Leica, Topcon, Geomax, Radiodetection, Sokkia, Pentax, Trimble, Spectra Precision, Suparule, C.Scope and Datum to name a few, you can be sure that you will find exactly what you need to complete any task successfully.

Call us on 01482 322191 or 07900 217081 to discuss your requirements.

We have stock of new and reconditioned instruments available, and we also puchase Used Surveying Equipment.

Overseas enquiries are always welcome. We are experienced in international exports and ship worldwide!
